bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLVI (Nos 3267-3315)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Rea J.R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLVI (Nos 3267-3315). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 65.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1978, 8°, xvi-127 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 30 (1979) pp. 102-109. - D. Hennig, Gnomon 52 (1980) pp. 347-350. - J. Irigoin, REG 92 (1979) pp. 250-251. - G. Nachtergael, ChrEg 56 (1981) No. 111, pp. 153-158. - José O'Callaghan, Orientalia 49 (1980) pp. 221-222. - Jean A. Straus, BibO 43 (1986) coll. 420-423. - J.D. Thomas, CR N.S., 30 (1980) pp. 316-317. - H.J. Wolff, ZSav 96 (1979) pp. 344ss.
